recipes.title: Spaghetti Carbonara
instructions: Boil the spaghetti in a large pot of salted water according to the package instructions.
In a pan, cook the pancetta until it is crispy. Add the garlic and cook for another minute.
Beat the eggs in a bowl, then mix in the grated pecorino and parmesan cheese.
Drain the spaghetti and add it to the pan with the pancetta. Remove the pan from the heat.
Quickly mix the egg and cheese mixture into the pasta, stirring vigorously to prevent the eggs from scrambling.
Season with pepper and garnish with parsley before serving.

recipes.title: Chicken Curry
instructions: Heat oil in a pan and sauté the onions, garlic, and ginger until they are fragrant.
Add the chicken and cook until it is browned on all sides.
Stir in the tomatoes, curry powder, turmeric, and cumin. Cook for a few more minutes.
Pour in the coconut milk and bring the mixture to a simmer.
Cook until the chicken is fully cooked and the sauce has thickened.
Season with salt and garnish with fresh coriander before serving.

recipes.title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
instructions: Preheat the oven to 170°C (340°F).
In a bowl, whisk together the flour and baking soda.
In a separate bowl, mix the melted butter, brown sugar, and granulated sugar until well blended.
Beat in the vanilla, egg, and egg yolk until the mixture is light and creamy.
Gradually add the flour mixture and mix until just blended.
Stir in the chocolate chips.
Drop cookie dough onto the baking sheet, and bake for 15-17 minutes.
Allow cookies to cool on the baking sheets before transferring to wire racks.
